name: It's hammer time!
description:
IT'S HAMMER TIME!

Smash your enemies with your hammer, but don't enjoy it too much, or it may became too long!

GENERAL INFORMATION

This game was made for the Tu juego a juicio Jam in 2021. The theme of this Jam is "Too long". In addition, this one was made using a homemade game engine written in C. There are executables for Linux, Windows and an HTML version. This game will be open-source soon, check our gitlab page. You can also check out our web page.

CONTROLS

Use ARROWS to move, and SPACE to smash with your hammer.
